channel.title: [508][Help] Bounty Hunter
channel.description: I've been trying to add Bounty Hunter to my 508 server for a while now and all the tutorials are pretty much not helpful and dont seem to work. If anyone could let me know how to put Bounty Hunter or Clan Wars in my server for a pk based server whether it be a link to a good guide or just something, that would be awsome. Thanks

item.title: [508][Help] Bounty Hunter
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Well check what type of tutorials you are using because 508 have diffrent bases such as

*codeusa
*palidino76
*espeon
*bulby

so some tutorials won’t work for some bases

Read full topic
